Eyebrows

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Playfair Display SC||||||||” header_4_font_size=”22px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”ABeeZee|600|||||||” header_6_font=”ABeeZee|700|||||||” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Powder-Ombre Brow

Style type; adds fullness by creating a soft tint-like shadow effect.

Microblading

Style type; the ultimate illusion of hair-like strokes. Giving you a naturally appearing fullness.

Combination of Microblade and Shade

Hyper-realistic look that combines hair strokes and background to give you more dimension.

Price for Initial Visit:

$500

Follow up (if needed) up to 6 months after initial visit:

$300

12 months after – up to 1.5 years:

$400

2 years and after (for existing clients):

$450

Corrective Work (per session):

$400

Removal (per hour):

$200

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#e8ad9d” header_3_font_size=”28px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” locked=”off”]

Lips

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_line_height=”1.2em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Playfair Display SC||||||||” header_4_font_size=”22px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”ABeeZee|600|||||||” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off”]

Lip Blush

A Lip blush is similar to a lip tint or lip stain.
$500 (per session)

Lip Liner

A lip liner can be created to add definition to your lips. As we age we tend to loose our lip pigmentation.
$400 (per session)

Lip Stick

Creating a lipstick effect. May require additional sessions to create.
$500 (per session)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#e8ad9d” header_3_font_size=”28px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” locked=”off”]

Eyeliner

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_line_height=”1.2em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Playfair Display SC||||||||” header_4_font_size=”22px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”ABeeZee|600|||||||” header_6_font=”ABeeZee|700|||||||” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off”]

Eyelash Line Enhancement

Eye lash line enhancement is done right through the lash line. Adding definition and fullness but no one knows you’ve had anything done!
$400 (per session)

Eyeliner

Yes! Full eyeliner!

Initial Session

$500

Follow up (within 6 months)

$295

Touch ups (up to 12 months)

$350[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Features Section” module_id=”contact-us” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_padding=”110px|0px|110px|0px” global_module=”383″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.4″ animation_style=”slide”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Poppins|500||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” header_2_font_size=”16px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” locked=”off”]
